title: Prison of Paradise
description: *This is my old work. This will have errors. It's raw and the beginning of my journey into writing. Take it or leave it. You have been warned.* A new set of problems. Eve must find a new way to handle things. Life keeps on moving, and she is struggling to keep up. The love she has for Evan should be fueling her ability to hold on. But she is in trouble, and may not have a way out.
author: Holly Hood
